message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into $7,500 for me and $2,500 for you. This offers a fair split considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I'll take the whole pie, but I'll let you have a chance to change my mind in the next round!
Considering the inflation, I propose we each receive $5,000. This maintains a fair division while accounting for the diminishing value of money.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a significant one, in the hopes you'll accept this time.
